thread.title: Edward Kuchta
thread.title_full: BenQ Direct reviewed by Edward Kuchta

author: Edward Kuchta
title: Edward Kuchta
text:
There are plenty of options available for a basic projector. Initial cost is always important, but quality performance is still vital.
With the BenQ projector, I have an affordable unitr that projects a quality image. It is well made and easy to use. I connect via a HDMI cable and am very satisfied.
